page.title: 06Factories in Stoke
page.content: There are lots of factories in this area.They are mostly potbanks.One of the biggest factories is the Michelin. The factories are important to us because without them people would have no jobs. But having factories means that there is pollution.Sometimes we can smell the fumes from the Michelin factory when we are in the school playground.The factories also take up a lot of space. In our school about a quarter of the children have relatives who work in a potbank.My mum works for the Royal Doulton potbank.She does not make the ware but she serves tea to the directors and staff. If someone wanted to build a new factory I think they should put it in Stoke because Stoke has lots of main roads,a railway,a river and a canal. There are lots of people to do the work
